original_title: 飛べないコトリとメリーゴーランド
overview: Kotori Haneda is a university student interning at a publishing house. While doing her internship, she is partnered with another intern named Eba Shimazaki; the two start a relationship, but her happiness is not to last.
tagline: Love and fantasy, spinning 'round and around...
title: Flightless Bird & Merry-Go-Round
